verbs.description: More detention tents in Texas [V: are] being set up to house migrant children taken from their families . This comes amid growing outrage over the Trump administration 's zero tolerance immigration policy , which is moving to prosecute all of the cases involving someone coming into the U.S. illegally . NBC 's Gadi Schwartz reports for Sunday TODAY .
